 Basic guidelines (7/7)                 
                                        
                                        
 * Mods have the final say on what      
   breaks the rules. Don't ignore a mod 
   when they tell you to stop something.
   Our intention is for TPP to remain a 
   fun and safe environment for everyone
   and so we reserve the right to act in
   any situation even if it's not       
   covered by these rules if the need   
   arises.
